p: Figure 3a compares the average values of WVP of PE films coated with different concentrations of carvacrol and menthol. It shows that the highest WVP amount was obtained in the control film (11.93 g/msPa), and coating of the PE film with different levels of carvacrol and menthol reduced the WVP amounts of the films ( p <.05). However, increasing the concentration of these additives in the coating solution did not show a significant effect on WVP of the film.
